explanation:
code_hardening: Marked the method as static and all parameters as final to enforce immutability; no behavioral input validation was added to avoid changing existing call semantics.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method from getDist to distFrom and aligned parameter names from lon* to lng* to match existing callers in the codebase.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Switched the Earth radius constant to meters (6371000) and ensured the returned value is in meters while keeping the haversine formula unchanged; computed radians inline and reused intermediate sine values.
refactoring: Converted the method to static, improved variable naming for clarity (lat/lng, radiusMeters), introduced intermediate sinHalfDeltaLat/sinHalfDeltaLng variables, and simplified expressions within the function.
misc: Added a comprehensive Javadoc comment describing the purpose, parameters, expected units, and return value; formatting adjusted to match the surrounding project style.
